i18n.title: Vector Quantization with KBinsDiscretizer
i18n.description: This lab demonstrates how to use KBinsDiscretizer from the Scikit-learn library to perform vector quantization on a sample image of a raccoon face. Vector quantization is a technique to reduce the number of gray levels used to represent an image. We will use KBinsDiscretizer to perform vector quantization on the raccoon face image. We will use 8 gray levels to represent the image, which can be compressed to use only 3 bits per pixel. We will compare the uniform and k-means clustering strategies to map the pixel values to the 8 gray levels.

meta.title: Vector Quantization | Raccoon Face Image | Scikit-learn
meta.description: Learn how to use KBinsDiscretizer from Scikit-learn to perform vector quantization on a raccoon face image, reducing the number of gray levels while maintaining image quality.
meta.keywords: vector quantization, image processing, Scikit-learn, KBinsDiscretizer, raccoon face

i18n.title: 使用KBinsDiscretizer进行向量量化
i18n.description: 本实验展示了如何使用Scikit-learn库中的KBinsDiscretizer对浣熊脸的样本图像进行向量量化。向量量化是一种减少用于表示图像的灰度级数量的技术。我们将使用KBinsDiscretizer对浣熊脸图像进行向量量化。我们将使用8个灰度级来表示图像，这样可以压缩到每个像素仅使用3位。我们将比较均匀和k均值聚类策略，以将像素值映射到8个灰度级。

meta.title: 向量量化 | 浣熊脸图像 | Scikit-learn
meta.description: 了解如何使用Scikit-learn中的KBinsDiscretizer对浣熊脸图像进行向量量化，在保持图像质量的同时减少灰度级数量。
meta.keywords: 向量量化, 图像处理, Scikit-learn, KBinsDiscretizer, 浣熊脸
